About.Hours & facilities: Open Sun 1-5pm and weekdays by appointment; closed public holidays. General reference assistance available. Copying services available for books, journals, original records to A3, photographs, maps and plans.

About.Acquisition focus: All material relates to the people and the history of the Nepean District - approximately the area now known as Penrith City Council District.

About.Major holdings: Photographs, pamphlet file, maps, local history books, and individual collections.

Contact.Street address: Corner Gardenia Avenue and Great Western Highway, Emu Plains 2750
